mapper.insert: insert into user_tb values ( default, #{username}, #{password}, #{oauth2Id}, #{provider}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{imgUrl}, #{imgPath}, #{roleId}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select user_id, username, password, oauth2_id, provider, name, phone, email, img_url, img_path, role_id, created_at, updated_at, from user_tb where user_id = #{userId}
select user_id, username, password, oauth2_id, provider, name, phone, email, img_url, img_path, role_id, created_at, updated_at, from user_tb where username = #{username}
select user_id, username, password, oauth2_id, provider, name, phone, email, img_url, img_path, role_id, created_at, updated_at, from user_tb where oauth2_id = #{oauth2Id} and provider = #{provider}
